member.name: M:ValveResourceFormat.CompiledShader.ShaderSpirvReflection.Clamp01
member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\bclamp\\s*\\(\\s*([^\\(\\),]+?)\\s*,\\s*(?:0\\.?0?|vec[2-4]\\s*\\(\\s*0\\.?0?\\s*\\))\\s*,\\s*(?:1\\.?0?|vec[2-4]\\s*\\(\\s*1\\.?0?\\s*\\))\\s*\\)
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
Match if at a word boundary.
Match the string "clamp".
Match a whitespace character atomically any number of times.
Match '('.
Match a whitespace character greedily any number of times.
1st capture group.
Match a character in the set [^(),] lazily at least once.
Match a whitespace character atomically any number of times.
Match ','.
Match a whitespace character atomically any number of times.
Match with 2 alternative expressions.
Match a sequence of expressions.
Match '0'.
Match '.' atomically, optionally.
Match '0' atomically, optionally.
Match a sequence of expressions.
Match the string "vec".
Match a character in the set [2-4].
Match a whitespace character atomically any number of times.
Match '('.

Match '.' atomically, optionally.

Match ')'.

member.name: P:ValveResourceFormat.CompiledShader.VfxProgramData.StaticComboEntries
member.summary: Gets the static combo entries dictionary, organized by zframe ID. Zframe data contains key information needed to decompress and retrieve zframes. The sorted dictionary enables retrieval both by order (using ElementAt) and by ID (using indexer).
member.remarks: Zframe data assigned to the ZFrameDataDescription class are key pieces of information needed to decompress and retrieve zframes (to save processing zframes are only decompressed on request). This information is organised in zframesLookup by their zframeId's. Because the zframes appear in the file in ascending order, storing their data in a sorted dictionary enables retrieval based on the order they are seen; by calling zframesLookup.ElementAt(zframeIndex). We also retrieve them based on their id using zframesLookup[zframeId]. Both methods are useful in different contexts (be aware not to mix them up).

member.name: T:ValveResourceFormat.IO.GltfModelExporter
member.summary: Exports Valve resources to glTF 2.0 format.

Physics mesh export functionality for the GLTF model exporter. Converts Source engine physics data (hulls, meshes, spheres, capsules) into GLTF geometry with proper UV coordinates, materials, and textures for each unique surface property.

member.name: M:ValveResourceFormat.IO.GltfModelExporter.FixDuplicateJoints(System.Span{System.UInt16},System.Span{System.Single},System.Int32)
member.summary: Processes joint and weight data to ensure consistency by: 1. Setting joints with zero weights to zero (no influence) 2. Merging weights of duplicate joint references 3. Ensuring valid data is packed into consecutive positions
member.param: Array of joint indices (ushort), organized in groups of size jointCount
Array of weight values (float), corresponding to each joint
Number of joints per vertex (typically 4 or 8)

member.name: M:ValveResourceFormat.IO.GltfModelExporter.TransformVertices(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Numerics.Vector3},System.Numerics.Matrix4x4)
member.summary: Transforms an array of vertices by the given pose matrix.
Triangulates a convex hull using its face and edge data. Generates triangle vertices, normals, and UV coordinates using planar projection.
Adds triangles from a triangle mesh to the vertex data. Generates normals and UV coordinates for each triangle.
Adds a single triangle to the vertex data with computed normal and planar UV coordinates.
Generates a procedural sphere mesh with proper normals and spherical UV coordinates.
Generates a procedural capsule mesh as a cylinder with hemisphere end caps. Uses cylindrical UV coordinates for the main body.

member.name: M:ValveResourceFormat.IO.GltfModelExporter.GeneratePlanarUV(System.Numerics.Vector3,System.Numerics.Vector3)
member.summary: Generates UV coordinates using planar projection based on the surface normal. Chooses the best projection plane based on the dominant normal component for optimal texture mapping.
Creates a GLTF mesh with physics geometry, materials, and textures. Uses tool textures for collision attributes when available, otherwise falls back to surface property textures.

member.name: P:ValveResourceFormat.ResourceTypes.Texture.ActualWidth
member.summary: Gets the actual width of the texture, using NonPow2Width if available and valid, otherwise Width. Some textures have displayrect set to 1x1, but that's not the expected size. If it's set to 1x1, but the real size does not expand to 4x4 (the usual block compression size), it's ignored.

member.name: P:ValveResourceFormat.ResourceTypes.Texture.ActualHeight
member.summary: Gets the actual height of the texture, using NonPow2Height if available and valid, otherwise Height. Some textures have displayrect set to 1x1, but that's not the expected size. If it's set to 1x1, but the real size does not expand to 4x4 (the usual block compression size), it's ignored.

member.name: T:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType
member.summary: Resource file block types.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.Undefined
member.summary: Undefined or unknown block type.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.RERL
member.summary: Resource External Reference List. Contains a list of external resource references.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.REDI
member.summary: Resource Edit Info. Contains dependency and compilation metadata for the resource.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.RED2
member.summary: Resource Edit Info 2. An updated version of stored in KV3 format.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.NTRO
member.summary: Resource Introspection Manifest. Contains structure and enum definitions for the resource data.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.DATA
member.summary: Resource Data. The main data block containing the resource's primary content.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.VBIB
member.summary: Vertex and Index Buffer Information Block. Contains mesh vertex and index buffer data.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.VXVS
member.summary: Voxel Visibility. Contains voxel-based visibility data.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.SNAP
member.summary: Particle Snapshot. Contains snapshot data for particle systems.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.CTRL
member.summary: Control Data. Contains configuration and control data in KV3 format for sounds, models, and other resources.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.MDAT
member.summary: Mesh Data. Contains mesh geometry data including hitbox sets and material groups.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.MRPH
member.summary: Morph Data. Contains morph target (flex/blend shape) data for meshes.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.MBUF
member.summary: Mesh Buffer. An alternative mesh vertex and index buffer format.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.ANIM
member.summary: Animation Data. Contains skeletal animation data.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.ASEQ
member.summary: Animation Sequence. Contains animation sequence group data.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.AGRP
member.summary: Animation Group. Contains animation group resource data.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.PHYS
member.summary: Physics Aggregate Data. Contains physics collision meshes and constraint data.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.INSG
member.summary: Input Signature. Contains shader input layout and signature data for materials.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.SrMa
member.summary: Source Map. Contains source mapping data for Panorama CSS files.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.LaCo
member.summary: Layout Content. Contains parsed VXML AST data for Panorama layouts.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.STAT
member.summary: Statistics. Contains compiled JavaScript metadata (e.g., public methods) for Panorama scripts.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.SPRV
member.summary: SPIR-V Shader. Contains compiled SPIR-V shader bytecode for S&box.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.FLCI
member.summary: File/Line/Column Information. Contains source location data (file, line, column) for compiled vdata files.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.DSTF
member.summary: Distance Field. Contains distance field data in KV3 format.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.TBUF
member.summary: Tools Buffer. Contains vertex buffer data for unused attributes (tools only).

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.MVTX
member.summary: Mesh Vertex Buffer. Contains vertex buffer data for meshes.

member.name: F:ValveResourceFormat.BlockType.MIDX
member.summary: Mesh Index Buffer. Contains index buffer data for meshes.
